mapper.select: select sql_calc_found_rows p.problem_id, p.title, p.enable, if(c.contest_name is not null, concat_ws(',', c.contest_name, p.category), p.category) as category, p.score, p.create_at from problem p left join `contest-problem` cp on p.problem_id = cp.problem_id left join contest c on cp.contest_id = c.contest_id where if(#{keyword} is not null, title like concat(#{keyword}, '%') or find_in_set(#{keyword}, category) or c.contest_name like concat(#{keyword}, '%'), true) limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows()

select sql_calc_found_rows p.problem_id, p.title, p.enable, if(c.contest_name is not null, concat_ws(',', c.contest_name, p.category), p.category) as category, p.score, p.create_at from problem p left join `contest-problem` cp on p.problem_id = cp.problem_id left join contest c on cp.contest_id = c.contest_id and p.enable = true where if(#{keyword} is not null, p.enable = true and title like concat(#{keyword}, '%') or find_in_set(#{keyword}, category) or c.contest_name like concat(#{keyword}, '%'), p.enable = true) limit #{start}, #{limit}; select found_rows()

select problem_id, title, description, timeout, memory_limit, output_limit, score, category, languages from contest_problem where contest_id = #{contestId} and start_at <= now() and problem_id = #{problemId}
mapper.insert: insert into problem(title, description, category, score, timeout, memory_limit, output_limit) value (#{title}, #{description}, #{category}, #{score}, #{timeout}, #{memoryLimit}, #{outputLimit})
mapper.update: update problem set title = #{title}, description = #{description}, score = #{score}, timeout = #{timeout}, memory_limit = #{memoryLimit}, output_limit = #{outputLimit}, category = #{category} where problem_id = #{problemId}
